name: Ursaluna
flavorText:
I believe it was Hisui's swampy terrain that gave Ursaluna its
burly physique and newfound capacity to manipulate peat
at will.

pokemon.name: Teddiursa
pokemon.flavorText:
If it finds honey,
its crescent mark
glows. It always licks its paws
because they are
soaked with honey.

pokemon.name: Ursaring
pokemon.flavorText:
Although it is a
good climber, it
prefers to snap trees with its
forelegs and eat
fallen BERRIES.
